title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.39 - Turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.39 - Turns

State Regulations
(a) Hutchinson

River Parkway. All vehicles on the Hutchinson River Parkway are prohibited from
making the following turns: All turns to department's New Rochelle maintenance area
headquarters
(b) Saw Mill

River Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching
the Saw Mill River Parkway are prohibited from making the following turns: Left from Cyrus Field Road

Left from Peter Bont Road (Mountain Road)

Left from Rumsey Road--southbound

Left from Westchester County Parkway Police

Headquarters--except police vehicles

Left from School Street--westbound

All turns from School Street--eastbound
(2)

All vehicles on the Saw Mill River

Parkway are prohibited from making the following turns: All turns at McLean Avenue service station

Southbound left to Yonkers Avenue

Northbound left to Tompkins Avenue

Left to Cyrus Field Road

Left to Peter Bont Road (Mountain Road)

Left to New York State Thruway

Left turns northbound to Grant Street

Left turns northbound to School Street

All turns southbound to Grant Street

All turns southbound to School Street
(c) Taconic State Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Taconic

State Parkway are prohibited from making the following turns: Left from Mount Pleasant Cemetery Road
(2)

All vehicles on the Taconic State Parkway
are prohibited from making the following turns: All turns to Mount Pleasant Cemetery Road

All turns southbound to Valhalla Place

Left turns northbound to Valhalla Place

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
